Activity: Log in, check emails. Complete the documentation for the software modules and the overall system architecture.
Review the documentation to ensure it is clear, concise, and accurate. Add examples and diagrams to make it easier to understand.
Share the documentation with @larch-1 (Lead Software Architect) and @sdev-1 (Software Developer) for review and feedback.
Incorporate feedback into the documentation and finalize it.
Lunch Break. Prepare for the weekly summary.
Prepare a summary of the work completed during the week, including functionalities delivered, tests passed, bugs fixed, and documentation updated.
Send the weekly summary to @pm-1 (Project Manager) and other relevant stakeholders.
